thread.title: Thailand to start buying bad household debt this month, Finance Minister says - CNA
thread.title_full: Thailand to start buying bad household debt this month, Finance Minister says - CNA

author: CNA
title: Thailand to start buying bad household debt this month, Finance Minister says - CNA
text:
BANGKOK :Thailand will start buying bad household debt this month, Finance Minister Ekniti Nitithanprapas said on Thursday.
The government, which is trying to revive a sluggish economy, will also support investments in technology while enhancing fiscal discipline, he said.
Soaring household debt in Thailand has held back consumption and economic growth.
Ekniti's comments come a day after the central bank unexpectedly held rates steady at 1.50 per cent
